page.title: 12 Drapers Mill
page.content: At one time there were three mills standing but now there is only one. This smock mill was restored sometime between 1968 and 1975. An earlier mill may have stood there since about 1695 but we are not sure. Little Drapers Mill used to stand not far away towards St.Peters. All through the 60's and the early 70's Drapers Mills C.P.School had a Windmill Fair to raise money for the restoration of the mill that was falling apart at the seams. The Fair was held on St.Johns Field. A plaque on the wall of the windmill says - This plaque is in memory of MR R.M.TOWES headmaster of Drapers Mills School from 1949-1974, without whose inspiration and dedication, this mill would not be standing today.
